title: Automate Instagram profile analysis with Airtop scraping and GPT-4o intelligence
description:
# What's up Guys. I'm LuÃ­s ğŸ™‹ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸
### If you need to analyze dozens of Instagram profiles every week, this isn't just another automation. Itâ€™s your new secret weapon.

Itâ€™s a fully structured workflow for anyone who needs to analyze Instagram profiles at scale, with AI, and keep everything tracked and organized â€” no manual effort, no copy-paste, and total control over the process.

## What this workflow does:
- Detects when a new or updated Instagram profile appears in Google Sheets
- Checks if the profile still needs analysis
- **Creates a account in Airtop and after create a session and new window in Airtop** for Instagram scraping (Airtop offers 5,000 free credits/month!)
- Automatically accesses the Instagram profile and scrapes public data
- Cleans and refines the data with OpenAI (AI) for maximum accuracy
- Performs a second layer of AI analysis for deep, actionable insights
- Updates all results and insights directly back into Google Sheets

### ğŸ§© How the flow is structured

This workflow is strategically divided into two independent parts to ensure clarity, organization, and easy scalability:

#### Part 1 â€“ Profile Capture and Data Extraction

- Triggered by a new/updated row in Google Sheets - **Take here your Template of Google Sheets** <> [[TEMPLATE] - Instagram Profiles](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rXvJuMg1LHsF5dHZobFmfZ3wk60jjp-bC-WkmIH8Jqc/edit?usp=sharing)
- Checks if the profile needs analysis
- Starts a session and new window on Airtop
- Scrapes the public Instagram data

#### Part 2 â€“ AI Analysis and Results Delivery

- Cleans and structures Airtopâ€™s output for AI analysis
- Uses OpenAI to process and refine the data
- Applies a second AI prompt for actionable insights
- Updates Google Sheets with all processed results

This structure makes the flow easier to manage, customize, and scale â€” plug in other tools without breaking the logic.

## Tools used:
âœ… **Airtop** (*Instagram scraping & session management*)  
âœ… **Google Sheets** (*database & dashboard*)  
âœ… **OpenAI** (*data parsing, refinement & analysis*)

## How to set it up:

- Connect your Google Sheet to the workflow  
- Register on Airtop, get your free credits, and set up your session: [https://portal.airtop.ai/](https://portal.airtop.ai/)  
- Add your Airtop credentials in n8n  
- Add your OpenAI API key  
- (Optional) Customize the AI prompts and sheet logic

## Why this workflow stands out:
ğŸ“Š ***Fully automated**: analyze dozens or hundreds of profiles without manual work*  
ğŸ¤– **Double-layer AI analysis** for maximum insights  
ğŸš€ Built to scale â€” ideal for **agencies, marketing teams, communities, and creators**  
ğŸ“ Everything tracked and accessible in Google Sheets  
ğŸ”— **Airtop integration**: scrape Instagram with zero headache

---

âœ… Works on both n8n Cloud and Self-hosted  
ğŸ” 100% secure. No hacks. No shortcuts.

Want to adapt this flow for your business, team, or community?

ğŸ“© Custom requests: WhatsApp me at +5534992569346

----
